It will be targeted at employers with 300 employees or less & also those in low-income neighborhoods

It will also make expenses on PPE & other #COVID19 prevention costs a forgiveable expense

Bucks and Montgomery Counties deserve a representative ready to rebuild an economy that works for everyone. That's why I'm proud to stand with @FinelloForPA in the fight to flip PA-01 and become the first woman to represent the district in Congress. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ednr-9JXkAcZzlZ.png

.@HaleIndy is a lifelong Hoosier running for Congress in the heart of Mike Pence country. As a nonprofit leader and member of the Indiana General Assembly, she earned a reputation for getting things done. I know she'll continue to work hard for her community in Congress. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EdnrnCXXsAEvYZg.png

I’m proud to endorse @DrCameronWebb in his run for Congress. Cameron has the expertise and experience needed to tackle our health care crisis and meet the coronavirus epidemic head on. We need strong voices like his to fight for equity and justice in Washington. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EdnrKjKXkAMVHWi.png

During this unprecedented time of crisis, working families need a proven progressive leader in Congress to call out corruption and stand up for the people. I’m proud to stand with @BethDoglio in this fight. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EdnqwNTXgAA1Dbr.png

.@KimGardnerSTL is a fearless fighter for St. Louis families, and she won’t back down in the fight for social, racial and economic justice. Kim has been a leader in holding police accountable and rolling back mass incarceration. It’s an honor to fight alongside her. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ednp7bAXsAEK_8c.png

.@JillSchupp is a true public servant who is dedicated to the people she represents. She has proven she is the leader Missourians need fighting for them in Congress. I’m proud to stand shoulder to shoulder with her in this fight and the fights to come. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EdnpdPfXoAIWNwq.png

I'm proud to endorse @SteelenChouse18's run for the North Carolina State House. As a principal, mother, and community leader, Aimy knows firsthand the struggles working families face. I know she will bring the leadership North Carolinians deserve. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Edno4ZAXsAgfYje.png

I’m proud to stand shoulder to shoulder with @SaraGideon in her run for Senate. Mainers deserve a senator who will fight to make our country work for the people, not the special interests. Sara will continue to be a champion for working families in Maine and across the country. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ednn0xeXgAAkPZA.png

It’s an honor to endorse Congressman @ColinAllredTX’s run for re-election. He has been a champion for working people and Texas families—and the 32nd District deserves a leader who is committed to fighting for a government that works for everyone. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EdnnYzGXsAA_S6w.png

Central Florida families deserve a progressive State Attorney who will fight to end the racist systems and policies that have unfairly targeted communities of color—like the school-to-prison pipeline and cash bail. I'm proud to endorse @MoniqueHWorrell’s candidacy. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EdnmwUoWAAgxza6.png
